name: Kathryn Hahn
description:
We don't speak for all Jews.

We only speak for the authors of this website. Sometimes we only speak for one of the authors of this website. Such are the perils of the royal we. Here, we just did it again. And again!

So let's us say it one more time:

We have absolutely NO PROBLEMS with goyishe actors playing Jews. None. Zero. Zilch. Insert other synonyms here.

Apparently, some other Jews do. Their latest target is Kathryn Hahn, a goyishe actress who has recently played a rabbi, but now has encroached on the holiest of holies: being cast as Joan Rivers in a biopic.

All this seems ridiculous to us. Hahn has terrific comic timing and will do a fine job as Joan, regardless of her lack of Jewishness.

WE are sure of that.
